participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, Emily enjoys expressing herself through art and values her independence.
participant_1.background: I will not care about what my family thinks. I can’t go a single day without eating ice cream. I spent my last birthday building a new deck for my house. I am studying literature. My favorite food is pizza.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Michael is friendly and hardworking, always looking for ways to connect with others and share his love for creativity.
participant_2.background: I'd love to share a meal with someone who shares my passion for sketching. I'm a little taller than average, but my height doesn't matter to me as long as I can find someone to share my love of Christmas with. I wish I could say that I do, but my health is more important. I like to arm wrestle. I currently hold three jobs.

content.text: I love pizza too! What is your favorite topping?
I love pepperoni, sausage, pineapple, and green olives. Do you like Christmas?
Yes! I love Christmas. What is your favorite part about Christmas?
I love spending time with my family and eating delicious food. Do you have a favorite Christmas tradition?
I love building a snowman with my family on Christmas Eve. What is your favorite thing to do on Christmas Eve?
I like to bake cookies with my family. Do you enjoy sketching?
Yes! I love to sketch. I have been drawing since I was a little kid. Do you sketch often?
I love to sketch too! I sketch whenever I have free time. Do you have a favorite sketching medium?
I love to sketch with charcoal. What is your favorite sketching medium?
